topics.body: Y'know, I've always been amused by the thought that Dragon Ball is a juggernaut success. Not that I'm badmouthing the series, I just expected Ghost in the Shell to have the kind of success DB had. And it's all because Akira Toriyama made shit up. No seriously, Toriyama just made up the story as he went along and the fact that he made a great manga is really something to astonish.
